imgs.text: Massachusetts Bay Hustler drawing on sailboatdata.com

name: HUSTLER 18 (MASSACHUSETTS BAY)
notes: The first boats, (built by Mower) were purchased by the Winthrop YC (near Boston MA). Some were built by Mt. Desert Yacht Yard in the late 1940's. Fiberglass construction was adopted in the 1950's. A fleet at Wollaston YC was active for many years.
